values:
DjXi - Vent is now available for download.
check it out.

ftp://public:public@4.65.199.191

as always please tell me what you think.

Djxi - Vent is now DONE
Its a 2 cd set that really shows off my style, what im hoping more though is that whoever listens to it... LIKES it. I really put some work into these and i hope you can hear that through the mixes.

Track listings are as follows:

(Disc 1)
1.) Paul Van Dyk - Techno Energy        (throwback to breese)
2.) Cosmic Gate - Exploration of Space
3.) Dj Tiesto - Flight 643
4.) Dumonde - God Music (Cosmic Gate Remix)
5.) Altitude - Tears in the Rain
6.) Rank1 - Awakenings
7.) 4 Strings - Into the Night (Paul Van Dyk mix)
8.) Eon - Pocket Damage
9.) Ferry Corsten - Star Traveler
10.) Future Breeze - Why Dont you Dance with Me
11.) Gouryella - Ligaya (Paul Van Dyk remix)
12.) Oceanlab - Clear Blue Water (Hennes and Cold mix)

(Disc 2)
1.) Armin Van Buuren - Prodemium
2.) Ayla - Angelfalls (Elemental Force mix)
3.) Silent Harmony - Save the Whales (trance mix)
4.) Lustral - Broken (Pitch and Sulfers Back in Time mix)
5.) The Eden Project - Heaven and Hell (Vocal mix)
6.) Tiesto - In My Memory (Gabriel and Dresden Elephant memory vocal mix)
7.) Oceanlab - Clear Blue Water (Above and Beyond remix)
8.) Dj Tiesto - Suburban Train
9.) Solid Globe - North Pole
10.) Paul Van Dyk - Another Way (club mix)
11.) Push - Tranceformation
12.) Dj Tiesto - Nyana

How can i get this, you ask?
Find any way to get a hold of me. simple as that.


Cheers!
remember to PLEASE tell anyone whos interested to get a hold of me. Im serious about this! I will even mail them to people at my own cost if needed. just so people get the word out.

Had a great new years eve. The mckay and i had a great time just by ourselves. It was a blast. I have discovered one thing tho... i need some more friends man! I was calling ppl after midnite... i called like 2 people, 3 if i could remember kens cell# (srryman) Sad... holy shit i need to use spellchecker and read through the post after i type it. it looks like george bush's speeches, my writing does. Ex: "i wont bother to explain it, simply because my head hurts too much to even bother" god im so angry today. job hunting sucks ass. i cant stand computers as a field of work... but it seems that its all im suited for while i goto school. ok enough of that listen knigs. Cd is very near completion. Im excited.

If you know anyone who likes techno or trance that wants free music let me know, i want to get this set out to everyone whos a fan of the music. 

not to just promote myself, but my name also, so forward them to my journal so they can drop a note saying they want the set as well as some way to contact them..

thanks!

The new Mix is right on its way, this season ive got 2 for you.(winter+spring)

The entire package will be titled "Vent"
One CD is a mixture of old school classic trance that should be pretty fun for anyone whos a fan of electronic music.

The other CD is an amazing mix of Epic and Melody trance that will be sure to please. (Think along the lines of a mixture of techniques between Acosta and Tiesto and you're on the right track)

Anyone is entitled to a copy, just ask me.
Also its illegal to charge for the music... i do, however ask for a 5$ donation to my cause ;) (you dont have to donate, but it'd be nice.)
well i got 1 thing cool this year. I really need a name for HER. help me out if you know of something cool.

To all the people who feel the need to buy an assload of shit to give away on christmas:

KISS MY ASS.

i wont bother to explain it, simply because my head hurts too much to even bother

YOU ARE EVERYTHING THAT IS WRONG WITH THIS COUNTRY.
kthxbye.

i was reading this today, ive read it before.. a long time ago, but i thought it so practical i needed to share it with the rest of you.


http://maddox.xmission.com/junk_the_junk.html

check it out!

i hate my friends.

they can never come through when im in a jam

maybe that is a reflection on me. if it is... i apologise. (but an apology isnt enough)

but anyway, yeah you used to be cool, then you turned into something else and now im upset because you know i would have done the exact same for you if i was able to.

kthxbye.

-Taren

I LOVE HEATHER MCKAY WITH ALL MY LITTLE TAREN HEART!!!

yeah thats right.

she is so much better than you.

im sorry i screwed up that time baby, but you've shown me that love conquers all.

here is to 6 more months of bliss with you as my #1!!!!!

<333333333

Kerry lost

You fucks probably didnt vote.
and now...

4 more years of horrible suffering due high taxes and loss of personal freedoms. (to fight the evil terrorists)

to be perfectly honest... anyone who WANTS to blow a building up in this country... probably can. regardless of what the government wants to do about it. so picking bush purely to stop terrorism or to fight the pointless war in iraq.. you can kiss my ass. kthx

i honestly dont know of any reasons someone under the age of 25 would even think to vote for bush... but whatever.

thanks you bastards.

btw: SEmagic reminded me that its chrissys birthday tomorrow. so happy birthday.

Its that time of year again where i bust out the barenaked ladies greatest hits... 

i highly recommend everyone going out to get it. its just that good.

Heather is the best person ever.

fuck... im still sick and i was going to write this whole nice thing about her.. but i dont have the mental capacity for it. seriously, i cant type right. it just hurts my head.

I totally love her. shes the bestest ever. 

she does however have some things that she wants me to say. 
1.) if you are a female -> Stay away from me.

i guess thats it, lol.

i dont know why im posting this to be honest.
her and i are doing well. im still sick as hell. i feel like dogshit and i just wanna goto her house and have her rub my back till i fall asleep. which is what i am gonna do starting right.....

now.

#$&$*

IM SO FUCKING BORED

i hate being sick.

i traded in the gamecube for an xbox.
very impatiently anticipating halo 2.

w0ot.!

I remember cass bitching all the time about drama drama drama... ive figured out how to end it... Rarely ever check, and post in your livejournal. Livejournal is for suckers. thank fucking god i managed to escape those who binded me to it. if you need to talk to me. aim = dark side of xi ablueturtle @ *SPAMPREVENTER* hotmail Heather and i are fine. thanks for asking. got offered a job in tampa... not sure if ill take it. it is pretty decent money though... but its in tampa.. and my car is shit. also. i purchased in my memory by dj tiesto yesterday from good old hot topic. good track. its got an airwave remix on it!!! AIRWAVE! im about to goto work, then head on over to McKays house for some megaman X action. anyone who knows me pretty much knows im obscessed with little blue robots that hail by the name of megaman. well the most exciting part of this months post(lol) is that capcom totally got smart and released a Megaman X RPG. yeah... megaman... in an rpg. Turn based combat. ITs totally badass. i cant put the controller down... and of course the female yells at me for it all the time.. but hey, how often does a little blue robot named X dance around your tv in beautiful 3d rendered glory while listening to some badass techno beats! (wait.... hrmmmmm thats bad doesnt it?) oh. btw. Zero is back... as is his black costume for anyone who cares... zero is my favorite video game hero of all time, behind samas aran of course. ohh!!! <3 (h3aRt) -Nerat Bob.

HEATHER IS SUCH A FUCKING PAIN IN THE ASS

IM SINGLE AGAIN!!! HURRAH!


I GOT 99 PROBLEMS BUT A BITCH AINT 1.




(just kidding)
me + heather = super.

livejournal sucks. you should delete yours and go outside... 
.. and just stare at the sky.

its beautiful.

im listening to all these old songs that used to mean something to me...
its totally rad.

things with heather are alright... 
my only complaint... shes blonde. she needs to think before she acts sometimes.

but seriously... delete your livejournal. go interact with people face to face. 


OH and check this out...

i saw a cute girl the other day at bestbuy... little sufer girl by how she dressed (capri's and hollister..) but when she turned around i almost punched her... because she had a monroe.

i mean seriously... it pisses me off because apparently thats the cool shit to do now.
all these little surfer boys walking around with lip piercings.. i mean damn. cut it out. its annoying.

crazy fucking days
back on track for me.
Taren is going to wisconsin... funny stuff.

Took out the septum ring.
Heather turned out to be alot more than i expected. Im totally happy with her.

She makes me smile :)


OH..

and...


ARE YOUUU JIMMMMMY RAY?????????
<3 that song so bad.
ange will understand :)

But im still so empty.

sorry about not updating.

it seems i work with nick now. i didnt much like him in the past but im sure we will get along just fine.

Im drunk im my desire

And i love the way you smile at me
I love the way your hands reach out and hold me near
I believe.
I believe this is heaven to noone else but me 
And ill defend it as long as i can be left here to linger in silence if i choose to. 
Would you try to understand?

Im sitting here...
alone..
in the dark..

Listening to Building a Mystery.
remembering things....

i looked at the clock and it was 12:22
i remembered looking at the clock at 11:30 when i fired up semagic

ive officially retired ferry corstens mixed live cd. i cant listen to it at all anymore... too many memories. 
i deleted all my lifehouse songs as well... more memories gone

i feel better.
i wish heather were here.

King Taren got a new throne today...

i even built it myself :)

its hawt!

livejournal is now public again, at the request of more than a few people.
no real personal stuff though... just fun stuff

Heather and I are officially together. well, we were a week ago i just didnt update. shes an awesome girl... just... blonde. (a 1st for me)

uhm... dickface (aka Britany) and I are going to go see her boyfriends show tonite @ state. it should be fun, heather is comming too. im excited about it i suppose. though im not sure how shes gonna fit in.

KO will be here soon, so im gonna go get ready for the festivities.

working on a new cd. right now i am aquiring the right songs. Im also about to aquire some webspace so i can just have everyone download them. I'll be making a new journal for those updates though. peaceout.

btw: this song = sooperfantastical.

dont think i didnt see you.

...dont ever come to my store and kiss that disgusting boyfriend of yours in front of me ever again.
you sure do have some balls kid.

Public entry...  i just felt like being nice to someone...

ive been thinking today... mostly cause tracey is a dumbass.. but whatever.

i had alot of good memories with you before you moved.

this song = one of the best.

so i wanted to say thank you... for giving me those memories.

nikos wedding man... it was so cute the wedding was a standard wedding ceremony... no need to get into that The 1st song niko and christine zervos danced to was amazed by lonestar. *sniffle* christine sang the song to niko as they danced... i wanted to cry. it was fantastic. niko was so red the whole day... it was awesome met up with a bunch of old friends... i miss everyone. i even saw crystal... she turned out hot as hell. i am now upset that i didnt ask her out when i had the chance, lol. niko and i had the chance to talk for a little bit one on one. we both cried. ive never had a moment like that before. im proud of him. i gave him a hug and a pat on the back and with that i was off... and yes ladies and gentlemen... i got hammered. i know i dont drink and all... but this was a specail occasion. :) after the reception i drove my drunk ass home and sobered up... then went out again! Kel ditched me so i decided to go out and meet up with my friend heather (IN FUCKING SPRING HILL) and we ended up going to this pool hall thats pretty much right across the street from cassies house. it was kinda amusing. heather is a rad girl. too bad im interested in someone else. Finially. because angela would have killed me if i didnt... ME! beforehand. Christine and niko zervos :) so so cute together. OH and theres another one. Mister Taren and Sir Niko :) <33333 niko and his daughter. Sorry it didnt turn out so well. OK ENOUGH WITH THE CUTE ONES! ON WITH THE FUN! Wedding cake! yummy! the man gets his prize :) good old sam... he always gets the laughs... at the bachelor party he was pouring beer in a wine glass and we called him a pussy...this is how he showed us up. lol best day ever. but i miss kel. i got home tonite and she must have already passed out. :(
i am now making pretty much all my entries friends only. The only ones who wont be friends only are going to be about my pictures and dj work.

Recompiled the summer mix... 

totally re done... Its burning to cd as we speak... then i get to take it for a spin on the car stereo (the true test of a mix is the car stereo, damn that midrange)

If it passes, i will distribute, sorry to who i promised a copy... the old one is scrapped, it sucks compared to this one.

btw: new song list
1.) George Acosta and Robert Miles - Children to the sky
2.) Ferry Corsten - Sublime
3.) Ferry Corsten - Kyoto
4.) Paul Van Dyk - We are Alive
5.) Verracocha - Carte Blanche
6.) ATB - Long Way Home (Steve M remix)
7.) Tiesto & JunkieXL - Obsession
8.) Push - Strange World (2000 remix)
9.) Rapid Eye - Stealing Beauty     (this song is still one of my very favorites)
10.) Sunscreem Vs. Push - Please save me
11.) Ferry Corsten - Right of Way
12.) Tiesto & Armin Van Buuren - Eternity (Inner City mix)
13.) Ascension - Someone (Thrillseeker remix)
14.) Robert Miles - Children

ITs good... trust me.
cya

Ill love you till the sky falls down..
Keep flying till i hit the ground
Ill love till you dont feel anything not anything at all
and even when your not around..
ill love you till the sky falls down.




oh my my my.... oceanlab.

NOW IS THE WINTER OF YOUR DISCONTENT!!!!!!!

lol
that stewie... hes so funny.

IT goes without saying that this country is in a fuckload of trouble. unless your blind and def (or just plain fucking stupid) you'd see shit happening around you that most of you wouldnt stand for any day of the week.

bush needs to go. its plain and simple.

my personal reasons for this... (there are tons more but these are just mine):

1.) Pointless war with iraq. This costs us billions of dollars each month. iraq has nothing to do with terrorism OR weapons of mass destruction.. which is the reason we went to war with them in the 1st place. NOT to mention the lives of all our friends and family fighting over there.

2.) in his 4 years in office bush has turned the biggest federal budget surplus in HISTORY (THIS MEANS SINCE THE US WAS FORMED) into the biggest budget deficit in HISTORY(MEANING WEVE NEVER EVER BEEN MORE IN THE DEBT) Are you gonna stand for that?

3.) A LARGE number of college graduates now cant find themselves decent jobs after graduation. WHY?! because of George W.

4.) $1.80/gallon for gasoline. ARE YOU FUCKING KIDDING?!!?!?!? I remember 4 years ago bitching when it hit $1.20. It now costs me almost 5 dollars to goto work and back each day. Thats fucking rediculous. 

Ok so im BEGGING all of you... read up on it.. and PLEASE...

VOTE FOR KERRY FOR THE LOVE OF GOD... THE REASON I DONT SAY VOTE FOR ANYONE BUT BUSH IS BECAUSE HE NEEDS TO LOSE... BY A LANDSLIDE. AND BY VOTING THE DEMOCRAT WE CAN DO THAT EASILY.

please visit this website for more information. Is pretty interesting.
http://johnkerryisadouchebagbutimvotingforhimanyway.com/
